title: Allows a plaintiff to have a small claims court hearing in the municipality in which the claim arose
summary: Allows a plaintiff to have a small claims court hearing in the municipality in which the claim arose.
lawSection: New York City Civil Court Act
actClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city civil court act, the uniform city court act, the uniform district court act and the uniform justice court act, in relation to the location of a small claims proceeding
